game_instances.prompt_player_a:
You are a customer who wants to make a booking.

You want to book a train. Someone else is helping you with that task and will suggest options to you.

You need a train to be:
{'destination': 'cambridge'}

Make sure to get:
['leaveat']

Keep the dialogue and the way you give and ask for information as natural as possible.
Make sure to never use any markup and only respond in natural language!

Once you have received all information which is relevant, choose one option. If you are content with the answer provided and it fits all your requirements, add the string FULFILLED to your final answer.

game_instances.summarise_in_json:
Please create a json object from the text that is provided below. Use only the text given below, do not use any background information.
Find all relevant data in the text and build an according json structure from that. Be sure to build the structure adhering to your input data, also see the example below for reference. Do not invent new keys, but only use the ones given in the example object. If the content does not match any key, that is fine, then nothing needs to be added. If you do not find anything to sum up, return an empty json object. If you find several instances mentioned, only choose one.
Always start with the json code immediately, as in the example structure, never add a name (like "answer"). Always use double quotes, never single quotes! 
Reply with the json structure only, do not add any comments.
